mapper.insert: insert into work_experience (work_id, resume_id, company_name, begin_time, end_time, work_describe, work_prove_pic_url) values (#{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workProvePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update work_experience set resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_describe = #{workDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_prove_pic_url = #{workProvePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select work_id, resume_id, company_name, begin_time, end_time, work_describe, work_prove_pic_url from work_experience
